title: Penjikent Tajikistan: Ancient Sogdian City & Archaeological Gem in Zeravshan Valley
description: Penjikent Tajikistan: Ancient Sogdian City & Archaeological Gem in Zeravshan ValleyPenjikent in Tajikistan invites history and archaeology lovers to explore the ancient Sogdian city ruins and enjoy scenic Zeravshan Valley — a blend of heritage and landscape.The post Penjikent Tajikistan: Ancient Sogdian City & Archaeological Gem in Zeravshan Valley appeared first on Travel And Tour World.

title: Shahr-e Sukhteh Iran: Ancient Desert City for Heritage Travel & Archaeological Tourism
description: Shahr-e Sukhteh Iran: Ancient Desert City for Heritage Travel & Archaeological TourismShahr-e Sukhteh, Iran’s ancient “Burnt City”, invites heritage travellers to explore well-preserved Bronze-Age ruins in the desert — a serene destination for archaeology and history enthusiasts.The post Shahr-e Sukhteh Iran: Ancient Desert City for Heritage Travel & Archaeological Tourism appeared first on Travel And Tour World.

title: Student unearths 150-million-year-old dinosaur fossil on first day of Montana dig: 'Very exciting'
description: Connecticut high school student Aidan Connor found a 150-million-year-old Jurassic dinosaur fossil during a paleontology dig, calling the find "quite exciting." Fox News Digital spoke with him.
